messages.subject: Revisiting the worst Shinsengumi film ever made....
messages.msgSnippet: http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/37668.html making more updates My original goal was to finish the film section by Friday---didn t happen because I need to
messages.messageBody:
http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/37668.html
making more updates

My original goal was to finish the film section by Friday---didn't happen
because I need to use a desktop computer to adjust images and the
machine was occupied.

In any case if you click here:
http://shinsengumihq.com/shq/?page_id=83

You'll see some very very old reviews back online, which is why I'm looking
for some fresh reviews which would give me an excuse to do some editing.

But most importantly "Kunoichi" (contains adult material--keep kids away
from this one) is available. It would've made a great film for Halloween
viewing because the quality was truly scary.

http://shinsengumihq.com/shq/?p=141

I pondered whether or not the screencaps I made were worth the server
space but I figured that any Shinsengumi film which used *slime* needs
to be preserved on the internet somewhere...
